DOC.brief_summary: Action Seniors!: A 12-Month Randomized Controlled Trial of a Home Based Strength and Balance Retraining Program in Reducing Falls Risk Factors
DOC.brief_title: Trial of a Home Based Strength and Balance Retraining Program in Reducing Falls Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Aged 70 years and older, present to a health care provider with a fall, mini mental state exam of at least 24 Progressive neurological condition, medical condition precluding participation in physical activity, residing in a nursing home/extended care facility
